description: This table contains information about a single finding.

columns.name: CV_FINDING_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the finding record.

columns.name: FORM_DATE_REAL
columns.description: The contact date real (DTE) of the associated contact in the Forms (LQF) master file. This is a unique contact date in decimal format. The integer portion of the number indicates the date of contact. The digits after the decimal distinguish different contacts on the same date and are unique for each contact on that date. For example, .00 is the first/only contact, .01 is the second contact, etc.

columns.name: WALL_STAGE
columns.description: The stage number for wall motion scoring.

columns.name: WALL_SCORE
columns.description: The average of the wall motion scoring.

columns.name: WALL_NORMAL
columns.description: The normal index of the wall motion scoring.

columns.name: WALL_MOTION_VIEW_C_NAME
columns.description:
The wall motion views select category ID for the finding record.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


LAO


RAO


Both

columns.name: FINDING_SEQUENCE
columns.description: Defines a relative order among result records (RES) in a report segment. For instance, a record with a value of 5 in this item will appear earlier in the report segment than a record with a value of 7 in this item.

columns.name: EP_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category number for the electrophysiology finding type. This is usually the same as the internal ID. If you use IntraConnect, this is the Community ID (CID).


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Intervals


Ablation


Ablation Summary


Ventricular Arrhythmia


Supraventricular Arrhythmia


Atrial Function


Cardioversion


ECG Rhythm


Sinus Node Function


His-Purkinje Function


Ventricular Function


AV Node Function


Atrial Pacing


Ventricular Pacing


Accessory Pathway


Ablation for Atrial Fibrillation


Refractory Period


Conduction Block

columns.name: SEC_FORM_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the secondary SmartForm associated with the finding record.

columns.name: SEC_FORM_ID_FORM_NAME
columns.description: The name of the form associated with the questionnaire.

columns.name: SEC_FORM_DATE_REAL
columns.description: The contact date real (DTE) of the associated contact of the secondary SmartForm. This is a unique contact date in decimal format. The integer portion of the number indicates the date of contact. The digits after the decimal distinguish different contacts on the same date and are unique for each contact on that date. For example, .00 is the first/only contact, .01 is the second contact, etc.
